greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: n-th term of the Kolakoski sequence (A000002) multiplied by the n-th partial sum.
link: Nathaniel Johnston, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: The Kolakoski sequence begins 1,2,2,1,1,2,...  and its sequence of partial sums (A054353) begins 1,3,5,6,7,9,... Therefore the opening terms are 1,6,10,6,7,18.
results.author: _Jon Perry_, Sep 21 2002
ext: Edited and offset corrected by _Nathaniel Johnston_, May 02 2011
